column5: can someone tell me how to post a picture that is 1.31mb Or do I have to take pictures that are less than 250k. Is there a way to reduce the size so I can post a older pic. thanks
just host the picture on something like photobucket, copy the direct link into the "insert image" icon above. And it should resize it for you (i think)
anybody know how to re size older pics that are too big so I can post them here?
